response.original_title: Qui est allé sur la lune?
response.overview: After President Kennedy received a call from his rival, Stalin, claiming to have reached the moon first, Kennedy devised a bold plan to fake the moon landing with the help of two smart scientists that were so desperate to find a solution which would be resolved by a simple digital camera that they both saw in their lab. After this bold plan, news will spread of this triumphus win for President Kennedy, which a famous reporter will interview him about this win.
response.title: Who went to the moon
